thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Toy Fair
thread.title_full: Toy Fair - Review of Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Tracy S
title: Toy Fair
text:
I have been staying at the Crown Plaza for the past 10+ years and they never let me down. The staff is what makes me keep coming back. I travel alone a lot and the bar is a safe an pleasant place to dine. A couple of my favorite are Keith, Martin and Philip. They go out of their way to make your stay enjoyable.
Room Tip: Make sure you can control the room temp. See more room tips
